# Priyanshu Garg - Portfolio

> Full Stack Developer building scalable web applications

## About

Priyanshu Garg is a Full Stack Developer currently working as SDE-1 at Plivo (since August 2024). Based in India, he specializes in building modern web applications using React, Node.js, Go, and cloud technologies.

## Current Role

**Software Development Engineer (SDE-1) at Plivo**
- Building cloud communication platform features
- Working with Go, React, TypeScript, AWS
- Focus on scalable backend systems

## Technical Skills

### Languages
- Go (Golang)
- JavaScript / TypeScript
- Python
- SQL

### Frontend
- React.js
- Next.js
- Tailwind CSS
- Material-UI

### Backend
- Node.js / Express.js
- Go / Gin
- RESTful APIs
- GraphQL

### Databases
- PostgreSQL
- MongoDB
- Redis

### Cloud & DevOps
- AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS)
- Docker
- GitHub Actions
- CI/CD pipelines

## Featured Projects

### Ledger
Shop management system for Indian small businesses
- Tech: React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Docker
- Features: Customer management, transaction tracking, GST invoicing
- GitHub: https://github.com/Priyans-hu/ledger

### StockFlow
Inventory management application
- Tech: React, Node.js, MongoDB
- Features: Stock tracking, order management, analytics

### PasteBox
Code sharing and snippet management tool
- Tech: Next.js, TypeScript
- Features: Syntax highlighting, expiring links, sharing

### UrbanKicks
E-commerce platform for sneakers
- Tech: React, Node.js, Stripe
- Features: Product catalog, cart, payments
